Header: Four female photographers swept away by waves off the coast of chilaw
Content: 4 women walking along the shores off the Chilaw coastline, were swept away by a strong current last evening. It has been reported that they were taking photographs with their backs to the sea shore. The four were abruptly swept away, 3 of them were rescued. However a 21 year old is still reported missing. The women are residents of Chilaw- Ilippadeniya. Police and Navy officers from Kalpitiya have commenced search operations to locate the missing woman.
